page.title: 13Transport from Kirtlington
page.content: We carried out a survey which was completed by 61% of people living in the village. Kirtlington is on the Oxford to Bicester bus route. We found that 7.9% of villagers use the bus daily, 18% use it weekly, 7.5% monthly, 29.7% use it less than once a month and 46.6% never use it. The train service from Tackley is a much less popular means of transport. Nobody from Kirtlington uses it daily or weekly. 0.8% of Kirtlington residents use it monthly and 2.6% use it less than once a month. 96.6% never use it. 12.2% of households do not have a motor car. 42% have one car and 39.4% have 2 cars. 6.4% have 3 or more cars. Motor cycles are not so popular, 80.5% of households do not have one at all. 15% have one motor cycle. Push bicycles however, are very popular, 46.5% of households have 2 or more.
